dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: Welcome, space explorers! I'm Captain Orion. Our ship has received a distress signal from planet Xylophia-IV.

dialogues.speaker: Lieutenant Luna
dialogues.text: Sir, scans indicate the planet's atmosphere is toxic to humans. We'll need to gear up before we can venture out.

dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: Agreed. Assemble a team and get ready for descent. We don't know what kind of situation we're walking into.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: The landing craft touches down on the outskirts of an abandoned city, sending up clouds of red dust. The team steps out, armed and cautious.
